      • SCALE

        private final int SCALE
        Object scale factor
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • timerDisplay

        private TimerDisplay timerDisplay
        Handles the game timer to display amount of time elapsed in the round. Starts the timer thread while the game is being played

      • traffic

        private Traffic[] traffic
        Array of Traffic Hazards, continuously moving on the window

        private WindowCloser window
        A handle on the window; terminates window when requested.

        Overrides:
        paint in class java.awt.Window

      • startTime

        private void startTime()
        Starts the game timer, which Counts down the time to complete a round of Frogger. Only starts the timer when key is pressed and Frogger makes its first move into oncoming traffic.
